Introduction.Description: The High Elves, or the Asur, as they call themselves, are one of the most ancient and powerful mortal civilisations within the Warhammer World. Hailing from a mighty mist-shrouded island-continent located within the centre of the Great Ocean, the High Elves of Ulthuan are a proud and mighty nation of masterful warriors, peerless mages and lords of the sky and sea. They are an ancient race with powerful armies and even grander magic, building a grand and all-mighty civilisation who, alongside the Dwarfs, fought a long-forgotten, apocalyptic war which saw some of the greatest and most powerful mortal heroes battle against the great darkness that tried to consume the world many thousands of years ago. At the zenith of their power, the world was truly theirs for the taking.

Magic.Name: High Magic
Magic.Alternative: Any of eight Lore of Battle Magic

LocalXmlOption.DragonArmour: AddToArmour: 5; Rule: Immune to all breath and all Flaming attacks

Weapon.Name: Blade of Leaping Gold
Weapon.Description: The blade confers +3 Attacks on the character wielding it.

Weapon.Name: Bow of the Seafarer
Weapon.Rule: Resolve each hit like a single bolt from a Bolt Thrower

Weapon.Name: Star Lance
Weapon.Description: Lance. The bearer receives +3 Strength on the turn he charges.

Weapon.Name: Reaver bow
Weapon.Rule: Longbow with Strength 5, multiple shot x3
Weapon.Description: Treat the Reaver Bow as a normal longbow with the following exceptions: the bearer may shoot three times at the same target in each ot his Shooting phases and any hits are resolved at Strength 5.

Weapon.Name: The White Sword
Weapon.Description: Model on foot only, requires two hands. The bearer adds +2 to his Strength when using the White Sword. In addition it confers the Killing Blow special rule.

Weapon.Name: Blade of Sea Gold
Weapon.Description: No armour saves may be taken against wounds caused by the Blade of Sea Gold.

Weapon.Name: Foe Bane
Weapon.Rule: All hits on a target with 2 or more Wounds on its starting profile will always wound on a 2+

Armour.Name: Armour of Protection
Armour.Description: Counts as light armour (armour save 6+) which can be combined with other equipment normally. It also provides a 4+ Ward save.

Shield.Name: Golden Shield
Shield.Description: This shield confers a 6+ armour save which can be combined with other equipment normally. In addition, all successful attempts to hit the bearer in close combat must be re-rolled.

Armour.Name: Armour of Stars
Armour.Rule: After any unsaved wound model is instantly teleported 3D6" in a random direction
Armour.Description: May only be worn by a model on foot. The Armour of Stars counts as light armour (armour save 6 + ) which can be combined with other equipment normally. If the wearer suffers an unsaved wound he is instantly teleported 3D6" in a random direction.

Armour.Name: Armour of Heroes
Armour.Description: Counts as heavy armour (armour save 5+) which can be combined with other equipment normally. In order to allocate close combat attacks against the wearer, an opponent must first pass a Leadership test. Test each Close Combat phase. If the test is failed, the enemy may not attack.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Temakador's Gauntlets
AdditionalArmour.Description: These gauntlets grant a 6+ armour save which can be combined with other equipment normally. They also give the bearer a 5+ Ward save against attacks of Strength 4 or greater.

Armour.Name: Shadow Armour
Armour.Description: Counts as heavy armour (armour save 5+) which can be combined with other equipment normally. In addition, if the wearer is an independent character on foot then he has the Scout special rule. He may choose to deploy either at the same rime as the other characters, or as a Scout (including setting up with a unit of Shadow Warriors).

Armour.Name: Armour of Caledor
Armour.Description: Confers a 2+ armour save, that cannot be improved by any means. In addition, the Armour of Caledor follows the normal rules for Dragon armour.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Helm of Fortune
AdditionalArmour.Description: This helm confers a 6+ armour save which can be combined with other equipment normally. The wearer may re-roll failed armour saves.

Shield.Name: Dragonscale Shield
Shield.Description: This shield confers a 5+ armour save which can be combined with other equipment normally. Also gives the bearer a 6+ Ward save.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Mask of the Merlord
AdditionalArmour.Rule: Can move over marsh, rivers, lakes or any other water features without penalty, and will benefit from soft cover while in such terrain
AdditionalArmour.Description: Model on foot only. This mask confers a 6+ armour save which can be combined with other equipment normally. In addition, the wearer can move over marsh, rivers, lakes or any other water features without penalty, and will benefit from soft cover while in such terrain.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Vambraces of Defence
AdditionalArmour.Description: Gives the wearer a 4+ Ward save. In addition, the wearer may re-roll failed armour saves.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Golden Crown of Atrazar
AdditionalArmour.Rule: Discount the first unsaved wound, even if it is a killing blow
AdditionalArmour.Description: One use only. Discount the first unsaved wound, even if it is a killing blow.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Loremaster's Cloak
AdditionalArmour.Rule: 2+ Ward save against wounds caused by spells
AdditionalArmour.Description: Gives the wearer and the unit he is with a 2+ Ward save against wounds caused by spells. It has no effect against shooting or close combat attacks.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Talisman of Saphery
AdditionalArmour.Rule: The magical weapons of enemy models will have no special effects whilst they are in base contact
AdditionalArmour.Description: The magical weapons of enemy models will have no special effects whilst they are in base contact with the bearer of the talisman. Treat the magic weapon as a normal one of its type, eg, a magic sword would count as a hand weapon, magic spear would count as a spear, etc.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Sacred Incense
AdditionalArmour.Rule: All shooting at the bearer or the unit he is with suffers a -1 to hit penalty

AdditionalArmour.Name: Guardian Phoenix
AdditionalArmour.Description: Gives the wearer a 5+ Ward save.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Amulet of Fire
AdditionalArmour.Rule: Cannot be harmed by Flaming Attacks
AdditionalArmour.Description: Gives the wearer Magic Resistance (1). In addition, the wearer cannot be harmed by Flaming Attacks.

Banner.Name: Battle Banner
Banner.Description: The unit may add +D6 to the combat resolution of any close combat in which it is involved.

Banner.Name: Banner of the World Dragon
Banner.Rule: The unit is completely immune to all spell effects, whatever their source
Banner.Description: The unit is completely immune to all spell effects, whatever their source. This includes friendly spells, bound items, and spells with areas of effect that were cast on nearby units, etc. Spells which are cast on another unit, such as the Flaming Sword of Rhuin, will work as normal, as will all magic weapons used to attack them.

Banner.Name: Banner of Sorcery
Banner.Rule: +D3 Power dice to pile in each Magic phases
Banner.Description: The banner adds +D3 Power dice to pile in each Magic phases.

Banner.Name: Standard of Balance
Banner.Description: The unit carrying the Standard of Balance, and any enemy unit in base contact with it, is immune to psychology. In addition, they also lose hatred and frenzy abilities (in the same way as a unit that has alteady fought and lost a round of combat).

Banner.Name: Lion Standard
Banner.Description: The unit is immune to fear and terror.

Banner.Name: Banner of Ellyrion
Banner.Rule: The unit treats difficult ground as open ground for purposes of movement

Arcane.Name: Book of Hoeth
Arcane.Rule: The bearer can ends the Magic phase immediately, all Remains in Play spells are dispelled and power dice stored in magic items are lost. One use only.
Arcane.Description: One use only. The bearer may use the Vortex Shard at the start of any enemy Magic phase. The Magic phase ends immediately, all Remains in Play spells are dispelled and power dice stored in magic items are lost.

Arcane.Name: The Vortex Shard
Arcane.Rule: Any spell cast by the mage with this book will be cast with Irresistible Force on any successful casting roll which includes any double, except a Miscast

Arcane.Name: Annulian Crystal
Arcane.Rule: During the enemy's Magic phase, the Crystal allows the High Elf player to remove one dice from the opponent's pile of Power dice and add it to his own Dispel dice pile

Arcane.Name: Sigil of Asuryan
Arcane.Rule: Automatically dispels one enemy spell. In addition, roll a D6. On a 4+ the spell is destroyed and the casting Wizard cannot use it for the duration of the battle. One use only

Arcane.Name: Starwood Staff
Arcane.Description: The Starwood staff gives +1 to all casting attempts made by the Wizard carrying it.

Arcane.Name: The Seerstaff of Saphery
Arcane.Description: The hearer may chixise his spells, instead of rolling for them at the start of the game.

Arcane.Name: The Trickster's Pendant
Arcane.Rule: Enemy Wizard suffers a Miscast he must roll twice on the Miscast table, the bearer of the Pendant chooses one of the two results
Arcane.Description: If an enemy Wizard suffers a Miscast he must roll twice on the Miscast table rather than once. The bearer of the Trickster's Pendant then chooses one of the two results. The chosen result is applied immediately. The other result is ignored and sloes not take effect.

Arcane.Name: The Gem of Sunfire
Arcane.Rule: For the duration of that Magic phase, the bearer gains +2 to all his attempts to cast spells from the Lore of Fire. One use only
Arcane.Description: One use only. At the start of any of his own Magic phases, the bearer may use the Gem of Sunfire. For the duration of that Magic phase, the bearer gains +2 to all his attempts to cast spells from the Lore of Fire for the rest of the Magic phase.

Arcane.Name: Ring of Corin
Arcane.Rule: Bound spell (Power level 3). One use only. Vaul's Unmaking spell
Arcane.Description: Bound spell (Power level 3). One use only. The Ring of Corin may cast its Bound spell in the Magic phase like an ordinary spell. The spell requires no Power dice to cast, all the power required is provided by the ring itself. The Ring of Corin contains the Vaul's Unmaking spell.

Arcane.Name: Staff of Solidity
Arcane.Rule: Mage immune to the effects of his first Miscast
Arcane.Description: This staff makes the Mage immune to the effects of his first Miscast. Note that a miscast spell still fails regardless of the actual dice score rolled.

Arcane.Name: Jewel of the Dusk
Arcane.Description: The jewel gives the Mage +1 Power dice in each of his own Magic phases.

Arcane.Name: Silver Wand
Arcane.Rule: Knows one more spell than is normal for his level
Arcane.Description: The wearer knows one more spell than is normal for his level.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Null Stone
AdditionalArmour.Rule: No Wizard within 6" ot the hearer may cast any spells. No other magic item or rune item within 6" of the hearer will work
AdditionalArmour.Description: No Wizard within 6" ot the hearer may cast any spells. No other magic item or rune item within 6" of the hearer will work. Treat them as normal weapons, banners, etc, of the appropriate type. Note that this applies to all friendly wizards and magic items as well as enemy ones.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Healing Potion
AdditionalArmour.Rule: May immediately restores all wounds lost at the start of any phase in either player's turn, one use only
AdditionalArmour.Description: One use only. The character or any character in base contact may drink this at the start of any phase in either player's turn. It immediately restores all wounds lost by the character during the battle so far. Obviously, if the character is dead at the start of the phase then he can't drink the potion.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Radiant Gem of Hoeth
AdditionalArmour.Description: The wearer counts as a Level 1 High Elf Mage. This has no effect on characters who are already Wizards.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Pendant of Vengeance
AdditionalArmour.Rule: All successful sinkings on the Anvil ot Doom must be re-rolled. In addition, subtract -1 from any results on the Failed Rune table

AdditionalArmour.Name: Dragonhorn
AdditionalArmour.Rule: Once per battle all friendly High Elf models may re-roll any failed Panic and Psychology tests until the start of their next turn. One use only
AdditionalArmour.Description: One use only. Once per battle, at the start of any of his own turns, the bearer may sound the horn. All friendly High Elf models may re-roll any failed Panic and Psychology tests until the start of their next turn.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Folariath's Robe
AdditionalArmour.Rule: Can only be hit by magical attacks
AdditionalArmour.Description: Model on foot only. The wearer of this cloak can only be hit by magical attacks (for example, Magic weapons and attacks from Daemons or Ethereal creatures). In addition, the bearer may not strike blows in combat, or shoot with a ranged weapon.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Ring of Fury
AdditionalArmour.Rule: Bound spell (Power level 3). Contains the Fury of Khaine spell
AdditionalArmour.Description: Bound spell (Power level 3). This ring may cast its Bound Spell once per Magic phase like an ordinary spell. The spell requires no Power dice to cast, all the power required is provided by the ring itself. The Ring of Fury contains the Fury of Khaine spell.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Cloak of Beards
AdditionalArmour.Rule: Dwarfs both Hate and Fear the wearer of the Cloak
Eeach model in base contact with the wearer loses all the runes from one of their runic items
AdditionalArmour.Description: Dwarfs both Hate and Fear the wearer of the Cloak. In addition, for the duration of each Close Combat phase, each model in base contact with the wearer loses all the runes from one of their runic items (determined randomly). Treat the item as a normal one of its kind.

AdditionalArmour.Name: The Skeinsliver
AdditionalArmour.Rule: +1 to the roll to determine which player takes the first turn
AdditionalArmour.Description: The Skeinsliver allows the controlling player to add +1 to the roll to determine which player takes the first turn.

AdditionalArmour.Name: The Amulet of Light
AdditionalArmour.Rule: All attacks made by the bearer in close combat count as Magical
AdditionalArmour.Description: All attacks made by the bearer (and the unit he is with) in close combat count as Magical.

AdditionalArmour.Name: The Gem of Courage
AdditionalArmour.Rule: The hearer (and the unit he is with) may take any one Leadership based test on 3D6, choosing the lowest two. One use only
AdditionalArmour.Description: One use only. The hearer (and the unit he is with) may take any one Leadership based test on 3D6, choosing the lowest two.

AdditionalArmour.Name: Talisman of Loec
AdditionalArmour.Rule: This item is used at the start of any Close Combat phase. The bearer may re-roll all rolls to hit and wound until the end of the phase. Any model wounded by his attacks this phase must re-roll any successful saves of any kind. At the end of the phase the bearer suffers one wound with no saves of any kind allowed. One use only
AdditionalArmour.Description: One use only. This item is used at the start of any Close Combat phase. The bearer may re-roll all rolls to hit and wound until the end of the phase. Any model wounded by his attacks this phase must re-roll any successful saves of any kind. At the end of the phase the bearer suffers one wound with no saves of any kind allowed.

HandWeapon.Name: Sunfang
HandWeapon.Rule: Once per battle in the Shooting phase, Tyrion may release the power within Sunfang, unleashing a ticry blast of magical power. Tills is a breath attack with a Strength ot 4

Individual.Rule: Any spell cast by Teclis will be cast with Irresistible Force on any successful casting roll which includes a double, except a Miscast

Arcane.Name: The Moon Staff of Lileath
Arcane.Rule: The Moon Staff gives Teclis D3 bonus power/dispel dice in each Magic phase

Arcane.Name: The War Crown
Arcane.Rule: Teclis may ignore the effects of the first miscast he makes each turn

Arcane.Name: Scroll of Hoeth
Arcane.Rule: One use only, same as Dispel scroll, in addition, both Teclis and the caster roll a D6: if Teclis scores higher, the spell cannot be reused by caster

RangeWeapon.Name: Moonbow
RangeWeapon.Rule: Moonbow shoot for 36" as single bolt from Bolt Thrower
Dark Elves must pass Panic test after each casualities

Arcane.Name: Shadow Crown
Arcane.Rule: If Alith Anar breaks from close combat, any opponents pursuing him must halve the distance they roll for pursuing

Arcane.Name: Stone of Midnight
Arcane.Rule: Anyone shooting at Alith Anar suffers an additional penalty of -1 on the roll to hit

HandWeapon.Name: The Phoenix Blade
HandWeapon.Rule: D3 wounds against enemy models with Unit Strength 2 or greater

Arcane.Name: Mark of Asuryan
Arcane.Rule: If Caradryan is killed in close combat, the model that killed Caradryan immediately suffers D6 wounds, with no armour save allowed
